title: Autotweaker Job Configuration
description: Configuration for a single design autotweaker job. The performance depends on setting these correctly!

waypoints.description: The list of waypoints every goal piece must pass through, in order.

items.description: A single waypoint with X and Y coordinates and a radius.

x.description: The X coordinate of the waypoint.

y.description: The Y coordinate of the waypoint.

radius.description: The radius around the waypoint. How close a goal piece needs to be to be considered to have reached the waypoint.

tickMinimum.description: The minimum number of ticks a backend run will execute for. Useful for designs with a slow start.

tickMaximum.description: The maximum number of ticks a backend run will execute for. Useful for designs with a known end time.
